name: seablock-evil-mode
title: Sea Block - Evil mode
author: jodokus31
description:
Voiding fluids and gas is heavily restricted.

Also, some additional changes can be enabled in settings (deactivated by default), which makes Seablock tougher, but sometimes with some potential to get more efficient. For additional challenge, the optional mod 'Burner power progression' gets preconfigured for evil mode
